name: The Kyn
description: Their visage and outward appearance matches their innermost aggression - draconian and bestial. Kyn tear their opposition asunder with wicked tendrils and with their inherent mastery over Body they’re able to physically extend their destructive range in an omnidirectional and nigh infinite reach. Their physical composition simultaneously behaves as a dense and durable solid, and should they will it to be so, a mercurial fluid - granting them both an unyielding force of presence as well as adaptable, flowing movement through their environment.
